title: Track Signalling Fault Resolved on East West Line

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train svcs btwn #TanahMerah and #ChangiAirport have resumed. Free regular bus & free bridging bus svcs have ended.
[EWL] UPDATE: Fault cleared, train services are progressively being restored. Pls add 10mins train travel time btwn #TanahMerah and #ChangiAirport.
[EWL] UPDATE: Fault cleared, train svcs are progressively being restored. Pls add 10mins train travel time btwn #TanahMerah and #ChangiAirport.
[EWL] UPDATE: Pls add 20mins train travel time btwn #TanahMerah and #ChangiAirport. We are working to recover svc.
[EWL] UPDATE: Pls add 30mins train travel time btwn #TanahMerah and #ChangiAirport. We are working to recover svc.
[EWL] UPDATE: Svc expected to resume at 06:20 AM.
[EWL]: Due to a track signalling fault, pls add 30mins train travel time btwn #ChangiAirport and #TanahMerah. Free regular bus are available between #Tanah Merah and #Changi Airport.
